title.rendered: Harry Styles, Nina Dobrev & More: Star Sighings 1.21.16

content.rendered:
Elle Magazine threw a bash for women in television, drawing the likes of How To Get Away with Murder’s Viola Davis, Nina Dobrev, Olivia Wilde and Fargo’ Kirsten Dunst.

Elsewhere, Chris Martin took son, Moses to a Lakers game, while Jennifer Lopez celebrated her new Las Vegas residency and the opening of Mr. Chow in the city of sin.

See what else your favorite stars were up to.
